document_data.caption: Probably pining for the fjords.
document_data.name: Polly
document_data.mainbody: '''Polly''' was once a living [[parrot]] with a sassy lip and colorful coat of feathers who later became a stuffed bird of [[Torleth's Treasures]] of [[Gillian's Hill]].
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], Polly was a staple of [[Torleth Mindulspeer]]'s curio shop in Gillian's Hill. The bird was stuffed, displayed on a perch, and posed with its head to the side as if listening attentively to the store's many guests. A note was attached to Polly's claw which read: "Poor Polly! She mimicked the captain one too many times. May she perch in peace."
